rooms.title: Two bedroom pool suite beach view

facilities.title: Angsana SPA
facilities.descr: Relax and rejuvenate with invigorating treatments using sustainable products at our award-winning Angsana spa. Enjoy perfected massage sessions with our therapists or salon services with our specialists.

facilities.title: Fitness centre
facilities.descr: Enjoy a Yoga or Pilates class while soaking in the sights and sounds of this tropical oasis. Experience the thrill of Thai boxing or stay in shape with a fitness session in our fully equipped gym.

facilities.title: Restaurants
facilities.descr: Our resort offers an extensive range of dining options that cater to all taste buds and occasions. Whether you are looking for a quick bite or a fine-dining experience, we have got you covered.

facilities.title: Swimming pool
facilities.descr: Dive into pure bliss at our resort's 323-meter free-form pool! Swim across the winding pool course, soak up the sun on our artificial beach, or relax on our lazy river. That is not all - our activity zone and jet pool will take your resort experience to a whole new level of awesome!

facilities.title: Poolside bar
facilities.descr: Fresh juices, delicious treats, and unique cocktail blends. Our bars provide an elegant and relaxed atmosphere, perfect for any occasion.

facilities.title: Beach
facilities.descr: Wade into the aquamarine waters of the Andaman Sea or soak in the sun on our sandy beach, a short 2-minute walk from the resort.

facilities.title: Golf
facilities.descr: Tee off at our award-winning Laguna Golf Phuket. This international standard championship golf course with picturesque views offers an experience like no other.

facilities.title: Events and meetings
facilities.descr: With a capacity to host over 1,000 guests both indoors and outdoors, our resort is the ultimate destination for unforgettable weddings, meetings, events, and gala celebrations.

offers.title: Stay More, Pay Less
offers.description: Discover the journey of a lifetime at the ultimate holiday destination. By extending your Phuket Getaway for a stay of 3 nights or more, you'll enjoy an incredible offer: a generous discount of up to 30% on your accommodation, free breakfast and special offers on Food & Beverages and a la carte spa services.

offers.title: Spartan Retreat : Relax and Refresh
offers.description: Whether you're a Spartan participant or a dedicated supporter, find your haven of tranquility, relaxation, and rejuvenation with us. Explore this Angsana Laguna Phuket and Blue Tree Phuket’s exclusive offer with complimentary breakfast for 2 persons, savings on food and beverages as well as à la carte spa services.

offers.title: Angsana Wellness Escape
offers.description: Embark on a transformative journey to rejuvenate your mind, body, and spirit with our exclusive Wellness Room offer at Angsana Laguna Phuket. With our unique package, you'll not only indulge in luxury and serenity but also take proactive steps towards a healthier you.

offers.title: Sharing Time
offers.description: Your family are the most important people in the world. Nothing compares to the trips taken together each one a defining rite of passage in itself, brimming with opportunities to forge meaningful connections and make lifelong memories. Come together on a trip of a lifetime, and enjoy 20% off our Best Available Rate and exclusive perks.
